verbLexeme: 1. To squeeze the juice out of a piece of fruit by turning it on a juicer or squeezer.
nominalLexeme: 1. A liquid that can be obtained from a fruit, such as an orange. English = juice.
2. A special device with a raised centre and fluted sides on which you turn a piece of fruit to get the juice out of it. English = juicer, orange squeezer.
oldEntry: Popular explanation: squeezing the juice from a piece of fruit.
